answers.answer: I'm a first time mom, I'm 16 and 35 weeks pregnant and I've also have been having trouble with my blood pressure being to high my face, feet, and hands are swollen which is common with preeclampsia. It's definitely stressful, and will worry you to death. If you find your stressing over it take a warm bath and try to relax maybe call your doctor and ask any questions you may have or tell your doctor your worries

The best way to deal with it is to lay down and relax. Take a nap if you can. This is my third baby and my third time having high blood pressure. The less your up moving around and doing things the better I have to be laid down for at least 15hrs a day now not easy at all. Goodluck.

question: So I went to the doctor and I am so stressed out that my blood pressure was 170/72 super high and I had to get blood work for hypertention/preclampsia and I do not know how to cAlm down I used to smoke weed every day I was a real pothead and now I am scared to smoke it bc I am already having problem after problem with this pregnancy! My husband does not understand and is not helping he is skiing it all worse I am afraid I am just going to snap the hell out I want to be alone and sleep for days
title: Need advise
